text: The Anguilloidei are a suborder of the order Anguilliformes (the eels) containing three families: *Anguillidae (freshwater eels) *Serrivomeridae (sawtooth eels) *Nemichthyidae (snipe eels) This suborder used to include several other families that have recently been moved to new suborders: * Chlopsidae (false morays) * Heterenchelyidae (mud eels) * Moringuidae (worm eels) * Muraenidae (moray eels) * Myrocongridae (thin eels) ==References== * Category:Eels
title: Anguilloidei
